name: Traffic Rules
description:
Instructions:

Both players start on the left side of the window. Move to the finish line as fast as you can, but don't move when the light turns red! Unfortunately, both players can turn the light red - Watch out for that sneaky other player, and make sure they don't catch you with your guard down! If you move when the light is red, you will get pushed back, maybe even as far back as the starting line! Good luck, and play "fair"! 

Controls:

Player 1: 

  • Move Forward: "D" key
  • Turn the light red: "S" key

Player 2:

  • Move Forward: Right key
  • Turn the light red: Left key
